column1: Wouldn’t mind getting that Coronavirus tbh
Got to love how my grandma told me she was worried she might have gotten the coronavirus cause some guy near her was coughing, I asked her if he was even chinese, he wasn’t lmaooo
Till you see in news that 3 Frenchmen have the coronavirus
IT WE COULD GO AHEAD N START CALLING THE CHINESE CORONAVIRUS THE KUNG FLU THAT WOULD BE GREAT
